name: Nick Huber
title: Architect
description: Having over 4 years of Salesforce experience, I've become a 5x Certified Salesforce Consultant. My journey has been shaped by numerous online resources, empowering me to excel in advanced Salesforce topics. It brings immense joy to tackle complex challenges and innovate solutions for companies, driving a sense of fulfillment. To express my gratitude, I'm dedicated to logging and sharing valuable examples, tricks, and solutions with fellow developers.
